# ğŸ  Lethub - Multi-Category Rental Marketplace

[![React](https://img.shields.io/badge/React-18.2.0-61DAFB?style=for-the-badge&logo=react&logoColor=black)](https://reactjs.org/)
[![Node.js](https://img.shields.io/badge/Node.js-Backend-339933?style=for-the-badge&logo=nodedotjs&logoColor=white)](https://nodejs.org/)

> A unified, mobile-first rental marketplace platform that simplifies how Kenyans discover, book, and manage rentals across multiple categories â€” all in one place.

![Rent Now Banner](data:image/png;base64,)

---

## ğŸ“– Overview

**Rent Now** addresses the fragmented rental market in Kenya by providing a single, comprehensive platform for listing and booking:
- ğŸ˜ï¸ **Housing** - Apartments, houses, and residential properties
- ğŸš— **Vehicles** - Cars, motorcycles, and transportation
- ğŸ¨ **Short-term Stays** - Airbnb-style accommodations
- ğŸŒ¾ **Land** - Agricultural and commercial plots
- ğŸ¯ **Conference Spaces** - Meeting rooms and event venues

### The Problem We're Solving

The current rental ecosystem in Kenya suffers from:
- âŒ Lack of listing verification and trust
- âŒ No unified payment platform
- âŒ Poor communication between renters and owners
- âŒ Scattered listings across multiple platforms
- âŒ Time-consuming search and booking processes

### Our Solution

A **secure, transparent, and user-friendly platform** that brings together renters and property owners with:
- âœ… Verified listings with rich media
- âœ… Integrated M-Pesa payments with automatic commissions
- âœ… Real-time chat with AI-powered assistance
- âœ… Smart booking and availability management
- âœ… Comprehensive admin dashboard for oversight

---

## âœ¨ Key Features

### For Renters (Tenants)
- ğŸ” **Advanced Search & Filtering** - Find exactly what you need by category, location, price, and availability
- ğŸ“… **Real-time Booking Calendar** - Check availability and book instantly
- ğŸ’¬ **Live Chat** - Communicate directly with property owners
- ğŸ¤– **AI Assistant** - Get instant answers to common questions
- ğŸ’³ **Secure M-Pesa Payments** - Pay safely through integrated mobile money
- ğŸ“± **Booking History** - Track all your past and upcoming rentals

### For Property Owners
- ğŸ“ **Easy Listing Management** - Add properties with images, descriptions, and pricing
- ğŸ“Š **Owner Dashboard** - Manage bookings, availability, and earnings
- ğŸ’° **Automated Revenue Tracking** - Real-time commission calculations
- ğŸ”” **Booking Notifications** - Get instant alerts for new bookings
- ğŸ’¬ **Direct Communication** - Chat with potential renters
- ğŸ“ˆ **Performance Analytics** - Track listing views and booking rates

### For Administrators
- ğŸ‘¥ **User Management** - Oversee all users and their activities
- ğŸ  **Listing Moderation** - Approve and verify property listings
- ğŸ’µ **Revenue Dashboard** - Track platform earnings and commissions
- ğŸ“Š **Analytics & Reports** - Comprehensive platform insights
- âš™ï¸ **System Settings** - Configure platform parameters

---

## ğŸ› ï¸ Technology Stack

### Frontend
- **Framework:** React 18 with Vite
- **Routing:** React Router v6
- **State Management:** Redux Toolkit
- **Styling:** Tailwind CSS + Framer Motion
- **UI Components:** Custom component library
- **Charts:** Recharts
- **Icons:** Lucide React

### Backend
- **Runtime:** Node.js
- **Framework:** Express.js / Django
- **Databases:** 
  - MongoDB (NoSQL - listings, chats)
  - PostgreSQL (Relational - users, bookings, payments)

### Integrations
- **Payments:** M-Pesa Daraja API
- **AI Chatbot:** Google Gemini AI
- **Real-time:** Socket.io
- **Cloud Storage:** Firebase Storage
- **Hosting:** DigitalOcean / Firebase

### Development Tools
- **Version Control:** Git & GitHub
- **Project Management:** Trello
- **Design:** Figma
- **API Testing:** Postman
- **Code Quality:** ESLint, Prettier

---

## ğŸš€ Getting Started

### Prerequisites
- Node.js (v16 or higher)
- npm or yarn
- Git

### Installation

1. **Clone the repository**
```bash
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/rent-now-web.git
cd rent-now-web
```

2. **Install dependencies**
```bash
npm install
```

3. **Set up environment variables**
```bash
cp .env.example .env.development
```

Edit `.env.development` with your credentials:
```env
VITE_API_BASE_URL=http://localhost:5000/api
VITE_SOCKET_URL=http://localhost:5000
VITE_MPESA_CONSUMER_KEY=your_consumer_key
VITE_MPESA_CONSUMER_SECRET=your_consumer_secret
VITE_GEMINI_API_KEY=your_gemini_key
```

4. **Start the development server**
```bash
npm run dev
```

5. **Open your browser**
Navigate to `http://localhost:5173`

### Building for Production
```bash
npm run build
npm run preview
```

## ğŸ“ Project Structure

```
rent-now-web/
â”œâ”€â”€ src/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ api/              # API service layer
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ components/       # React components
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ common/       # Reusable components
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ listings/     # Listing-related components
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ bookings/     # Booking components
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ payments/     # Payment components
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ chat/         # Chat & messaging
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ admin/        # Admin dashboard
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ pages/            # Route pages
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ context/          # React Context providers
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ hooks/            # Custom React hooks
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ redux/            # Redux store & slices
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ routes/           # Route configurations
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ services/         # External services
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ utils/            # Helper functions
â”œâ”€â”€ public/               # Static assets
â””â”€â”€ package.json
```

## ğŸ’° Revenue Model

**Commission-Based System:**
- Automatic commission deduction from all M-Pesa transactions
- Real-time earnings tracking in admin dashboard
- Transparent revenue distribution
- Scalable with platform growth
- Self-sustaining business model

## ğŸ¯ Roadmap

### Current Version (v1.0) - MVP
- [x] Project setup and architecture
- [ ] User authentication (Login/Register)
- [ ] Multi-category listing system
- [ ] Basic search and filtering
- [ ] Booking calendar
- [ ] M-Pesa payment integration
- [ ] Real-time chat
- [ ] Admin dashboard

### Future Enhancements (v2.0)
- [ ] Mobile app (Flutter)
- [ ] Advanced analytics for owners
- [ ] Review and rating system
- [ ] Push notifications
- [ ] Multi-language support (English, Swahili)
- [ ] Integration with other payment methods
- [ ] AI-powered price recommendations
- [ ] Virtual property tours

2. **Create a feature branch** (`git checkout -b feature/AmazingFeature`)
3. **Commit your changes** (`git commit -m 'Add some AmazingFeature'`)
4. **Push to the branch** (`git push origin feature/AmazingFeature`)
